009package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
010
011import imagingbook.common.util.parameters.DialogParameterBundle;
012
013/**
014 * Common interface for Nagao-Matsuyama filter implementations.
015 * 
016 * @author WB
017 */
018public interface NagaoMatsuyamaF {
019        
020        /**
021         * Parameter bundle for Nagao-Matsuyama filters (implementations of {@link NagaoMatsuyamaF}).
022         */
023        public static class Parameters implements DialogParameterBundle {
024
025                @DialogLabel("Variance threshold (0,..,10)")
026                public double varThreshold = 0.0;
027
028        }
029        
030        abstract class Constants {
031                protected static final int[][] R0 =
032                        {{-1,-1}, {0,-1}, {1,-1},
033                         {-1, 0}, {0, 0}, {1, 0},
034                         {-1, 1}, {0, 1}, {1, 1}};
035                        
036                protected static final int[][] R1 =
037                        {{-2,-1}, {-1,-1},
038                         {-2, 0}, {-1, 0}, {0, 0},
039                         {-2, 1}, {-1, 1}};
040                        
041                protected static final int[][] R2 =
042                        {{-2,-2}, {-1,-2},
043                         {-2,-1}, {-1,-1}, {0,-1},
044                                  {-1, 0}, {0, 0}};
045                        
046                protected static final int[][] R3 =
047                        {{-1,-2}, {0,-2}, {1,-2}, 
048                         {-1,-1}, {0,-1}, {1,-1},
049                                  {0, 0}};
050
051                protected static final int[][] R4 =
052                        {        {1,-2}, {2,-2},
053                         {0,-1}, {1,-1}, {2,-1},
054                         {0, 0}, {1, 0}};
055                        
056                protected static final int[][] R5 =
057                        {        {1,-1}, {2,-1},
058                         {0, 0}, {1, 0}, {2, 0},
059                                 {1, 1}, {2, 1}};
060                        
061                protected static final int[][] R6 =
062                        {{0,0}, {1,0},
063                         {0,1}, {1,1}, {2,1},
064                                {1,2}, {2,2}};
065
066                protected static final int[][] R7 =
067                        {        {0,0},
068                         {-1,1}, {0,1}, {1,1},
069                         {-1,2}, {0,2}, {1,2}};
070                        
071                protected static final int[][] R8 =
072                        {        {-1,0}, {0,0},
073                         {-2,1}, {-1,1}, {0,1},
074                         {-2,2}, {-1,2}};
075                        
076                protected static final int[][][] SubRegions = {R1, R2, R3, R4, R5, R6, R7, R8};
077        }
078        
079}
